message.body: Going to see another show tonight?
Just watched Michael Jackson One. That was really cool.
Singing and dancing. Very cool.
What kind of show is that?
Lol a whole bunch of people dancing and jumping around. It's by Cirque Du Soleil.
It's interesting how they have a Michael Jackson show without Michael Jackson.
So Vegas!
There is a restaurant in Bellagio called Picasso, and they have actual Picasso paintings in there. Crazy....
Whoa! They must be charging an arm and leg there!
Yes they did. Hahaha
Doing Vegas right Steve!
Lol. More blackjack tonight. How's your night?
Pretty much just winding down and thinking about tomorrow. It's going to be a hectic/go go go kind of day! We have to leave the house by 8:30 and I'm driving to KOP and Limerick.
Oh lots of shopping ehh?

Vy has to pick up a lot of stuff for Brandon, Adam, and the twins tomorrow. She didn't get to go the last few days. We have to be back pretty early to help out with prepping for the party and then get ready. We're going to be on a tight schedule
And then they flight out Monday morning so we're leaving at 5:30 a.m.
Man, I'm going to be pretty sleep deprived.
You?
What's on the agenda for tomorrow?
More casinos. Lol. We are sleep deprived too.
Yea, seems like you've been up all hours of the night! Having fun for the rest of us.
That's right. Not trying to get some sleep?
I am, but you know me.
Aw time to count sleep
Sheep*
I've never been to Costco before. They opened one right next to the KOP mall.
I think that's been there a while.
Well there's one next to Premium Outlets too, probably would have been more convenient to come here.
Yeah. Costco getting bigger now.
There are a lot of people.
Costco?
My sister's house.
Party time.
I'm tired. Going to stay up to take a drive with my sister, do laundry, and then drive them to the airport.
So no sleep again? Oh man. You need a nap.
